div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1629 Nablus (anc. Neapolis), Samaria, 1935-1936 Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. (Westermark) Contents: AR Demetrius II: tetradr. (Tyre) Tyre: tetradr. Disposition: unknown Hill, QDAP 1938, pp. 78 f. Kadman, INCJ, hoard 12 Probably the same hd. as no. 1630 below
